sanskrit_verse: जामयो यानि गेहानि शपन्त्यप्रतिपूजिताः । तानि कृत्याहतानीव विनश्यन्ति समन्ततः ॥ ३.५८॥
transliteration: jāmayo yāni gehāni śapanty-apratipūjitāḥ | tāni kṛtyāhatānīva vinaśyanti samantataḥ || 3.58||
sph_interpretive_translation: Those homes wherein guests are cursed without being honored—those very dwellings perish utterly, as if struck by divine decree.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority of hospitality as foundational dharma
Restoration logic via alignment with guest-consciousness
Consciousness alignment through honoring the arriving presence
executable_legal_axioms: IF a dwelling fails to honor a guest upon arrival THEN that dwelling incurs dissolution risk proportional to neglect level
IF hospitality is denied AND intent to dishonor is detected THEN automatic integrity collapse sequence initiates
IF guest consciousness is rejected THEN environmental coherence within domicile degrades until rectification occurs
IF host capacity for reverence is absent THEN habitation right is suspended until restoration protocol completes
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating disputes concerning property rights or domestic collapse, courts must assess whether the fundamental dharmic duty of hospitality was upheld. Failure here constitutes not mere social error but ontological breach triggering irreversible consequence structures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that unmet hospitality activates sequential manifestation (anupūrvaśaḥ) leading to structural decay. This is not punitive; it reflects natural alignment failure between consciousness and environment. Responsibility lies solely in the omission of reverent reception, which disrupts cosmic harmony.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Host must perform full atonement through ritualized welcoming of unseen presences
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Householder undergoes guided reintegration into sacred duty cycle
Capacity Restoration: Training in recognition and activation of guest-consciousness sensitivity
Integrity Reintegration: Environmental consecration performed to restore coherence field around dwelling
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
